body.name: Premium Pillows Queen Size Set of 2, Fluffy and Supportive 7D Down Alternative Bed Pillows, Luxury Soft Hotel Quality Gusseted Pillow for Side Back Stomach Sleepers, Relief Neck Head and Shoulder Pain
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 7 hrs 17 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: ✅【Soft and Breathable Material】The pillows are made of premium 3D+7D breathable microfiber material, which has better ventilation and heat dissipation and prevents you from overheating during sleep. The sleeping surface of the pillows are smooth and skin-friendly, creating a relaxed and comfortable sleeping environment.

✅【Optimal Support】Ergonomic design combined with mechanics, 40°elevation fully matches the physiological curve of the head and neck. The appropriate support force can better support the head, shoulders, and neck. Whether you choose to sleep on your back, side or stomach, it can help balance and relieve neck pain and shoulder stiffness to the greatest extent possible.

✅【Reliable Certification】The pillows have the OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certification, indicating that the products do not contain any harmful chemicals, and meet the safety and environmental standards of the test. You can use the products with confidence.
✅【Double Edge Sewing Design】Exquisite double edge sewing design and detail handling, and black double edge to create hotel-level luxury style.Let you enjoy the hotel quality pillows sleep experience.

✅【Simple Care Mode】Due to vacuum packaging, please open the pillow before use and leave it for 24 hours before use. After patting, the pillow will return to the fluffy state. Our pillows are easy to wash. You can choose machine washing or low temperature drying, and everything will be completely new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, sturdy pillow
reviews.reviewText: We are very happy with these new pillows. I bought two for our queen size bed. After a month or two of use, I can say that we are very satisfied. I find the height and level of softness/firmness to be right for me. I’m a side sleeper, and I have not experienced any negative issues. Definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft but too soft
reviews.reviewText: Edit: I've changed my mind. They're still not as firm as I'm used to but I think they're more comfortable. I love these pillowsThe pillows are very soft. But in my opinion they are too soft. Other reviews had stated that the pillows were too firm so I thought they'd be perfect for me, but I lay my head on them and my head practically rested on the mattress underneath. So if you like firm pillows, this is probably not for you. On the bright side, stacking these on top of my old pillows has created quite a nice, plump pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One the firm side
reviews.reviewText: These are finely crafted and comfortable pillows but are not what I'd call "soft". We're keeping them for the guest bedroom as they are a quality addition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and firm
reviews.reviewText: I bought queen size to replace older pillows that had lost their oomph. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: About 3 nights in so far. Wife stole the first one from me so now we each have one. It's firm enough for side sleeping with a CPAP, but not rock hard. So far, just right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic quality and high value pillows!
reviews.reviewText: I've ordered these pillows 5 times now! Five! They are honestly of excellent quality and a tremendous value for the money. They are so affordable that every time a loved one complains about their pillows, I just order more and gift them proudly. New apartment housewarming? These pillows. Moving into a dorm room? These pillows. Aunt wakes up with a sore neck? These pillows. Guest bedroom? These pillows. Yeah, they're really that awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had been getting the firm pillows nd it took quite a while of sleeping on them before they'd get really comfortable. I was a little nervous going to medium density but I'm very impressed! They fely really comfortable from night #1 and I love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fluffy in the beginning.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been on the hunt for pillows for about a year. I’ve tried so many different brands and came across these and figured why not. The first few weeks the pillow was as super “puffy” which I loved without being too firm which is the problem I run into a lot. But over a few weeks the pillow has flattened in the center. The sides are still very puffy. Maybe I got a dud. It’s still comfortable, just not “the one”. So I’ll still be looking for my perfect pillow.
